rBody.wit: CAO-R CAO-L Alb2 Evm Mch Wcb Ely

res.rBody:
Erumpant montes Erumpent montes iucunditatem et colles
iustitiam laetitiam quia lux mundi dominus cum potentia
venit veniet

rBody.note: Body of respond missing as a result of lost folio. Identity presumed on the basis of the text of the regressio

verses.vBody: De Sion exibit lex et verbum domini de Jerusalem
Domus Jacob venite et ambulemus in lumine domini
Laetamini cum Jerusalem et exsultate in ea omnes qui diligitis eam
Leva Jerusalem oculos et vide potentiam regis

rep.wit: CAO-R CAO-L Hyd Alb2 Mch Ely
